entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain early this evening. Periods of rain beginning early this evening then changing to 30 percent chance of showers before morning. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023
